subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Wright, the Mets’ 32-year-old third baseman, missed significant time with injuries in 2011, in 2013 and last season. On Tuesday, he sustained a hamstring strain.
snippet: Wright, the Mets’ 32-year-old third baseman, missed significant time with injuries in 2011, in 2013 and last season. On Tuesday, he sustained a hamstring strain.
